query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
1 Parea dinanzi a me con l’ali aperte 2 la bella image che nel dolce frui 3 liete facevan l’anime conserte;
query.error: **English:** 1 There appeared before me with open wings 2 the beautiful image that in the sweet enjoyment 3 the souls made joyful, joined together;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
4 parea ciascuna rubinetto in cui 5 raggio di sole ardesse sì acceso, 6 che ne’ miei occhi rifrangesse lui.
query.error: **English:** 4 each one seemed a ruby in which 5 a ray of sun burned so brightly 6 that it was reflected in my eyes.
query.result: 4 pubonan a omdhiskwedhes kepar rubin y'n-mes 5 owth skynnans howl owth omloskes dhe gem, 6 owth omdhrehevel dhe dhe'm dewyn.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
7 E quel che mi convien ritrar testeso, 8 non portò voce mai, né scrisse incostro, 9 né fu per fantasia già mai compreso;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.

query.error: **English:** 10 for I saw and also heard the beak speak, 11 and sound in its voice both "I" and "mine", 12 when in its concept it was "we" and "ours".
query.result: 10 rag y'm gwelas ha'ga y'm klevs an bek owth leverel, 11 ha'gas owth omdhiskwedhes y'n lefen "ow" ha "my", 12 pan o esedh y'n-mes an konsept "ni" ha "niver".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
16 e in terra lasciai la mia memoria 17 sì fatta, che le genti lì malvage 18 commendan lei, ma non seguon la storia».
query.error: **English:** 16 and on earth I left my memory 17 such that the wicked people there 18 praise it, but do not follow the story".
query.result: 16 Ha war an Norvys y'm genesva'm kov, 17 Marow gwell, an dus tus an bobel, 18 Y'gan molya henna, mes na'n sev an story".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
19 Così un sol calor di molte brage 20 si fa sentir, come di molti amori 21 usciva solo un suon di quella image.
query.error: **English:** 19 Thus a single heat from many coals 20 is felt, as from many loves 21 there came a single sound from that image.
query.result: 19 Marow un gwellader a-ugh lies brasow, 20 A vydh klevys, avel a lies myn, 21 Un sôn unnik a dheuth dhyworth an image na.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.

query.result: 22 Ha my a-wosa: "O flowrys byth, 23 A'n lowena sempiternel, ow synsys 24 An gwella oll agas saworyow,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
25 solvetemi, spirando, il gran digiuno 26 che lungamente m’ha tenuto in fame, 27 non trovandoli in terra cibo alcuno.
query.error: **English:** 25 satisfy me, by breathing, the great hunger 26 that has long kept me famished, 27 not finding any food on earth.
query.result: 25 Sowlwya vy, ow respira, an brassa brâs 26 A wra'm beu termen hir owth omma, 27 Heb kavos byth war an Norvys boos."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
28 Ben so io che, se ’n cielo altro reame 29 la divina giustizia fa suo specchio, 30 che ’l vostro non l’apprende con velame.
query.error: **English:** 28 I know well that if in heaven another kingdom 29 divine justice makes its mirror, 30 that yours does not apprehend it with a veil.
query.result: 28 Y'm ow kewsel, mar yn keth reame erel, 29 An gwirder byth a wra'ga'y mirva, 30 Na'gas nyns ywth ow komprehendya gans velame.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
31 Sapete come attento io m’apparecchio 32 ad ascoltar; sapete qual è quello 33 dubbio che m’è digiun cotanto vecchio».
query.error: **English:** 31 You know how attentively I prepare myself 32 to listen; you know what that doubt is 33 that has been my hunger for so long.
query.result: 31 Whythowgh whythowgh an fordh owth omma parow 32 Rag klevos; whythowgh pyth yw an dowt na, 33 A wra'm owth omma ow brassa hir owth koth.

148 che dal fianco de l’altre non si scosta».
